findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library unnecessarily, which adds complexity and overhead.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Not declaring variables as immutable, leading to potential gas inefficiency.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity naming conventions, affecting code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Missing events in the contract that could cause issues with arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code in the contract, making it harder to understand and maintain.

findings.title: L11 - Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: Unnecessary boolean equalities, making the code less clear and concise.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Uninitialized local variables leading to unpredictable behavior.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Not validating user-supplied input, leading to potential issues with zero values.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly code unnecessarily, making it harder to read and understand.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: Not checking if transfer methods are successful, potentially leading to incorrect assumptions.
